name: Deckromancer ConBravo 2019 Demo
description:
Deckromancer is a Tri-Peaks Solitare style card clearing game! 

  Clear cards and get the highest possible score while learning to master Suit Synergies and clearing the board with the highest combo!

 This is the demo shown at ConBravo 2019, and is a "lite" version of a future final product. The demo is effectively the full playable game, without some bonus features such as online leaderboards and achievements. If you enjoy the demo and want to support development on a future version, please feel free to add a couple bucks when you download it! Any amount is appreciated~

  Tri-Peaks Solitare Card Clearing Gameplay
  Easy-to-learn, Difficult-to-Master
  Local High-Scores
Amazing soundtrack by commandycan
